reviews.review: Åhh gode gamle, du er savnet!
Пожалуй самая лучшая игра, которая останется навсегда в душе )
Супер! Всем советую! Отличная игра, классика

Игра достойно держалась около 12 лет на киберарене,но её время иссякло. Да, аудитория в игре... "не айс". Но старушка 1.6 дожила своё. Для своего времени игра на 10 из 10. На 2014-й год.... максимум 3 из 10.
Но всё же помня детство в этой игре, когда играл против ботом у старшего брата, или как часами сидели в клубах, просто веселясь и играя в неё - я рекомендую её, только из-за воспоминаний.

Mesmo a Valve esquecendo o Counter-Strike 1.6, ele sempre continuará sendo um mito, jogo que deu ínicio/abriu portas para outros jogos FPS no mercado, excelente jogo, porém hoje mesmo com o pessoal migrando para jogos mais avançados, não foi esquecido por completo.
Recien lo compre Y dije debe ser la verga y asi es :v
Nostajiye dönmek bence çok güzel düşünmeden alın derim.
Game is good for any lower spec PCs, but may have a little lag. Overall a decent game.

Pokial ste si zvykli na CSS alebo CSGO (ako ja), tak tu toho vela nezahrate. Sice je to stary dobry counter (spalil som 100ky az 1000ky hodin) a stale sa najdu hraci ktori to drvia (da sa najst server a zahrat) ale uz je prilis vela rozdielov oproti najnovsej verzii.

Hraci CSGO: neodporucam (tych rozdielov je tam vela)
Oldschool hraci, ktori trvaju na povodnej verzii, hura do toho :)
Super  się sprawuje :) czasami mi się zetnie ale mam nadzieje że to wina komputera jestem zadowolona :)
Simplemente el mejor juego en primera persona que e jugado, leyenda! (1.6)
No bots if you suck at online or have crappy wifi connection tho

This game is the game that started the Counter-Strike series.  It started as a mod for the game that started it ALL, Half-Life.  Like Team Fortress, Counter-Strike became a standalone game after its' popularity as a mod.  If you enjoy the old Half-Life engine, GoldSrc, and want to play a shooter that doesn't have a complicated story and chapters, Counter-Strike is the game for you.  Condition Zero is the same game but with a "campaign mode" that allows you to play with bots and unlock maps as you go.
Я рекомендую эту игру она очень интересная и подолгу поиграть можно

[h1]I love Counter Strike, I should end it here.
But I'll be honest and say I grew up with Source, wasn't old enough to experince 1.6 sadly.
But giving it a try, it's very different, having to buy ammo, see what the original maps looked like before being changed in Source.
And dealing with pros that somehow can deal with the game choppyness and inaccuracy.
I'll stick with Source, but great game!

9/10[/h1]

Great game with an active community! Just dont expect to be playing any normal missions any time soon, i also enjoy the smoke in this installment, you can see through it if you walk right through it, also it is suprisingly difficult for the first installment, maybe im just bad, i dont know, so anyways get this game if you like team based FPS' if you dont like that genre, i reccomend you skip this one, 7/10
